amendment.description: Amendment requires the Congressional Task Force on Economic Growth in Puerto Rico to report back to Congress on recommended changes to Federal law and programs that would reduce child poverty.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-610 to require the Congressional Task Force on Economic Growth in Puerto Rico to report back to Congress on recommended changes to Federal law and programs that would reduce child poverty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jolly amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Jolly.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jolly amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
